title: Minimum duration for a ProtocolDAO snapshot vote
body:
As discussed in our last signer's call (May 2021) a 4/8 quorum is only accepted once the snapshot vote ends. This is because the remaining 4 signers could still vote for the opposite. Therefore enough time needs to be granted to allow all signers to reach a decision. 

On the other hand, a fast resolution is in some time-sensitive cases preferred to speed up the governance process.

Both considerations need to be weighed against. 

During the call, 48h was suggested.

**Should we set the minimum duration for a valid ProcotolDAO snapshot vote to 48h?**
author: 0xE76Be9C1e10910d6Bc6b63D8031729747910c2f6
